entry.title: Hello Hana Card.

entry.title: Secure your Bitcoin with Ledger.
entry.content: Hana Wallet now supports Ledger integration for Bitcoin on both desktop and mobile devices! With this update, managing and securing your BTC has become safer and more convenient.What’s new?Ledger support for Bitcoin: Connect your Ledger hardware wallet to Hana and manage your BTC securely.Available across devices: Desktop users can upgrade to version 3.6.0, and mobile users can update to version 1.31.0 to start using Ledger with Bitcoin today.Why use a cold wallet like Ledger?Cold wallets, such as Ledger devices, are designed to provide the highest level of security for your digital assets. By storing your private keys offline, they protect your funds from online threats like hacking and phishing attempts. Integrating Ledger with Hana Wallet ensures your BTC remains safe while giving you full control over your transactions.Ready to enhance your security?Update your Hana Wallet today and connect your Ledger to manage Bitcoin with peace of mind.Have questions or need assistance? Visit our Support Center to chat with us on the web or in-app.Secure your Bitcoin with Ledger. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.

entry.title: Use Hana on Stellar.
entry.content: The Hana Wallet team is excited to share the growing synergy between Hana Wallet and the Stellar blockchain. With a strong focus on usability and security, Hana Wallet is your gateway to managing Stellar blockchain assets across devices!Manage Stellar Blockchain Assets with Hana WalletHana Wallet enables users to send and receive a wide variety of assets on the Stellar blockchain. While we are actively working on automatic detection for all tokens, users can reach out to our Support Center if they want specific assets to be prioritized for detection.Ledger Cold Wallet CompatibilityOur integration with the Stellar blockchain includes full support for Ledger cold wallets. This ensures that users who prefer the additional security of cold storage can confidently manage their Stellar-based assets through Hana Wallet.Access Soroban dApps through Hana’s In-App BrowserHana Wallet features an in-app browser that allows users to interact with decentralized applications (dApps) on the Soroban ecosystem. For developers, Hana Wallet is available as part of the official Stellar wallet kit, making it easy to enable compatibility for their dApps within Stellar’s ecosystem. Connect to these Soroban applications with Hana Wallet today:Soroswap — The first DEX of the Soroban blockchainDeFindex — Diversified DeFi strategiesStellar Carbon — A simple way to make negative emissions contributionsBalanced — Coming soonNew Routes for In-App XLM SwapsUsers are currently able to swap into XLM directly within Hana Wallet, powered by ChangeNOW exchange. The equivalent decentralized feature is currently in the final stages of audits and will go live once the integration by Balanced is complete. Cross-chain DEX movement of assets within Hana Wallet is powered by Balanced.Highlights from Stellar Meridian in LondonOur team recently attended the Stellar Meridian conference in London, where we connected with leading developers and ecosystem partners. The event showcased how Stellar is driving real-world blockchain-powered solutions, with inspiring projects already transforming lives across Latin America and Africa. Hana Wallet aligns with this vision by enabling users to easily move assets across chains while retaining full self-custody.Stellar Meridian opening keynote by Executive Director Denelle DixonDownload Hana Wallet TodayHana Wallet is available for download on both desktop and mobile devices. Get it today on Chrome, Apple’s App Store, or Google Play and start managing your Stellar blockchain assets.We are excited about our journey with Stellar and remain committed to delivering real solutions that empower users. Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to build!Use Hana on Stellar. was originally published in Hana World on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.
